title: Cheese topped baked tomatoes
ingredients: ['4 large ripe tomatoes, sliced 5mm thick', '2 tablespoons grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '20g fresh breadcrumbs', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '2 sprigs fresh parsley, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
